subject: Re: Hi all you EVP Buffs
author: leongbabe@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1212259335
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hi,
 
Since you asked, my name is Sharon Leong and I'm a member of the San  
Francisco Ghost Society (_www.sfghostsociety.org_ (http://www.sfghostsociety.org) ).  
Having  seen Frank's box at The Stanley Hotel last year, I joined the EVP-ITC 
group  earlier this year in order to learn more about this interesting 
device.   One of the most compelling examples of an EVP I've captured (with my 
camcorder)  is at the Queen Anne Hotel, which is uploaded on the SF Ghost Society's 
web site  under Audio/Video evidence.  Time is a factor for me at the moment, 
and  when I get a chance, I will post some findings on the EVP-ITC group's  
site.
 
Sharon



**************Get trade secrets for amazing burgers. Watch "Cooking with 
Tyler Florence" on AOL Food.      
(http://food.aol.com/tyler-florence?video=4&?NCID=aolfod00030000000002)

-------------------------------1212259335
